1: <mistake>@@//sen</mistake> po'i <mistake>phyar</mistake> bcom ldan//dam pa zad med <mistake>hin</mistake> tu <mistake>dg'//gsang</mistake> nyid <mistake>byir</mistake> na snying <mistake>p'id</mistake> <mistake>byangs//hAu</mistake> <mistake>yigdam</mistake> pa <mistake>zang med</mistake> <mistake>pa'o//de</mistake> la ji ltar <mistake>ne</mistake> ba'i snying po de nyid kyi <mistake>l</mistake>
2: shes yin zhe <mistake>na/dkyal</mistake> 'khor dag ni dman pa <mistake>dang//dam</mistake> tshig dag ni spangs pa <mistake>dang//de</mistake> nyid gsang ba mi <mistake>shas</mistake> pas//rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub pa min//'dod pa bcom ldan sems
3: dpa' ste//de kho <mistake>n</mistake> ni 'dod chags <mistake>yang//rdo</mistake> rje phyag na rdo rje ni//chags bral de dang 'grub pa min//ling <mistake>g</mistake> <mistake>'grang</mistake> bar rang 'byung ste//brla yi steng du bzhugs byas nas//ling ga mchod rten
4: byin brlabs te//rdo rje dbyings ni rang bdag <mistake>'gyur //ling</mistake> <mistake>g'greng</mistake> <mistake>par</mistake> rang byung ste//brla yi steng du bzhugs nas su//ling <mistake>grdo</mistake> rjer byin brlabs te//khrag 'thung zhes bdag sngon <mistake>sky'o//</mistake>
5: <mistake>lingg</mistake> <mistake>'gredg</mistake> bar rang byung ste//brla yi steng du bzhugs nas <mistake>su//yengg</mistake> pad+mar byin <mistake>brlbs</mistake> te//dag pa'i chos bdag sngon <mistake>skye'o//lingga</mistake> <mistake>'geng</mistake> bar rang byung ste//brla yi steng du bzhugs nas
6: su//ling <mistake>grin</mistake> chen byin brlabs te//rdo rje nyi mar bdag sngon bskyed//ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste//brla yi steng du bzhugs nas <mistake>su//lang</mistake> <mistake>sna</mistake> tshogs byin <mistake>rlabs</mistake> te//rta mchog dag
7: ni sngon <mistake>skye'o//bha</mistake> gar ling ga bcug byas te//der ni <mistake>khams</mistake> yig bsgom par bya//rnam par snang mdzad gzugs <mistake>dg</mistake> <mistake>'og//sku</mistake> gnyis ldan pa spro bar <mistake>bya//bha</mistake> gar ling <mistake>g</mistake> <mistake>bcu</mistake> <mistake>gnas</mistake> su//
8: de la <mistake>hA</mistake> yig bsgom par bya//shin <mistake>du</mistake> dga' 'dra'i gzugs dag ni//sku <mistake>gnyes</mistake> ldan pa'i spro <mistake>bya'o//bha</mistake> gar ling <mistake>gbcug</mistake> nas su//de la <mistake>hIi</mistake> yig bsgom par <mistake>bya/ /khrag</mistake> <mistake>'khung</mistake> <mistake>'draba'i</mistake>
